title: Unbridled
description: Words: 149,363 (approximate)Unbridled is the sequel to Initiation - A provocative story about a boy who was initiated into a clandestine sexual society. This book follows the boy’s 2nd Arab household erotic and exotic adventures as a model, for the household patriarch’s controversial photography project, “Sacred Sex in Sacred Places”. It is also a love story between the young man and his 2 ‘Big Brothers’/chaperones.
author: Young
